Riedel Ouverture -Set of 2 Water/Beer Glasses
List.Description:
The Riedel Ouverture series are the ideal all purpose glasses for everyday use. The collection offers perfectly shaped wine glasses at competitive prices.

The Ouverture series is made from lead free crystal.

The water/beer glasses hold 12 3/8 oz and stand 5 7/8" high.
Sold in a boxed set of 2.

The bottle pictured in the background is for size representation only. Wine sold separately and encouraged for best enjoyment of glassware.

See other Riedel Ouverture sizes and styles

Riedel Vinum -Set of 2 Pinot Noir/Burgundy Glasses
List.Description:
Vinum was the first machine-made series of glasses in history based exclusively on the characteristics of grape varietals. Vinum has had a permanent impact on the globe's wine culture. These glasses have proved that the pleasures of consuming wine start with the glass.

The Vinum Pinot Noir/Burgundy glass is excellent for full-bodied red wines (more than 12.5 percent alcohol) with high acidity and moderate tannin. This glass directs the flow of wine onto the zone of the tongue which perceives sweetness, thereby highlighting the rich fruit and tempering the high acidity of the wine. The large bowl captures all the nuances of the wine's aroma.

Recommended for: Barbaresco, Barbera, Barolo, Burgundy (red), Gamay, Nebbiolo, Pinot Noir. Each glass stands 8 1/4" high and holds 24 3/4 oz. Boxed set of 2.

Wine sold separately.

See other Riedel Vinum sizes and styles

The Vinum series is made from 24% lead crystal.

Attention California residents. Proposition 65 warning:
Consuming foods or beverages that have been kept or served in leaded crystal products or handling products made of leaded crystal will expose you to lead, a chemical known to the State of California to cause birth defects or other reproductive harm.

List.Name: Pride Mountain Vineyards Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2003
Pascal Cotat Sancerre Les Monts Damnes 2008
Riedel 'O' -Set of 2 Riesling/Sauvignon Blanc Tumblers
List.Description:
This Riedel glass series has something missing; there is no stem or base. Riedel 'O' is the innovative take on the wine tumbler, the designs of which are based on the benchmark shapes of the Riedel Vinum. These are the ideal glasses for every day use and for every occasion; they are fun and feel good to hold.

The 'O' series is a lead free machine blown series, and is dishwasher safe. The 'O' Riesling/Sauvignon Blanc tumbler is ideally suited to showcase the best characteristics of light to medium bodied white wines such as Riesling, Sauvignon Blanc, White Bordeaux, Gewurztraminer and Semillon.

Tumblers hold 13 1/4 oz and stand 4 1/4" high.
Sold in a boxed set of 2.

Wine sold separately.

See other Riedel 'O' tumbler sizes and styles
